summary: In order to settle a business dispute, a mob leader murders one of his own teenage sons. The surviving son vows to avenge his brother's death, and organizes his own gang of teenage killers to destroy his father's organization.
cast: Shôsuke Tanihara|Miho Nomoto|Tamaki Kenmochi|Marie Jinno|Kenji Takano|Takeshi Caesar|Satoshi Niizuma|Rin Sakiyama|Kenzo Hagiwara|Gôsen Mikami|Yûichi Minato|Katsu Itoh|Masahiko Sakata|Jun'ichirô Asano|Eiichi Furui|Manzô Shinra|Ikuo Kono|Mickey Curtis|Yoshitaka Shioyama|Satoshi Imafuku|Tatekawa Wacol|Tomoatsu Tsuchihira|Akira Suzuki|Ken'ichi Sano|Yoshiki Hirano|Mizuki Nakamura|Hiroyuki Tsunekawa|Keitaro Mizuta|Tobinosuke|Keisuke Mishima|Tailor Minami|Keiji Mukai|Tôru Minegishi|Riki Takeuchi|Tomorô Taguchi
title: Gokudô sengokushi: Fudô
